title: A Superfriends farewell to Sean Wagner-McGough for his last podcast (Football 7/6)
description:
Will the Superfriends ever be the same? Sean Wagner-McGough makes an announcement that you probably have heard or seen by now, that he's leaving sports media for...law school. Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson and John Breech say goodbye to Sean, remembering his finest moments and not-so-finest moments. Sean looks back on his time with CBS Sports and on the podcast, while answering questions from our loyal listeners. Enjoy this trip down memory lane and final podcast farewell to a Superfriend...Well, until Jay Cutler comes out of retirement or Brand New releases an album!
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @seanjwagner, @johnbreech
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7ZUfHFsuQcW7BkTHnXJtqw?view_as=subscriber
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/

To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
